BE it enacted by the Quean’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the autho- rity of the some, as follows :—
4. This Act may be cited as the Rabies (Amend- shat sine, ment) Act, No. 28 of 1958.
